title: [AF-1771116373] Context Window Management - Final Review and PR Creation
description:
QA has completed review of Context Window Management feature with APPROVAL.

Feature Summary:
- Context budget tracking with real-time monitoring
- Progressive message history summarization
- Priority-based context inclusion (4 levels)
- Automatic tool output summarization
- Warnings at 80%, checkpoints at 90%

Quality Metrics:
- Linting: 9.53/10 (Excellent)
- Security: 0 vulnerabilities
- Tests: 20/20 passed (100%)
- Regression: 369/369 passed (100%)
- Code Quality: Excellent across all dimensions

No blocking issues found. Minor style issues (non-critical) identified.

Tasks for Architect:
1. Final code review and approval
2. Create PR to main branch
3. Link PR to JIRA ticket AF-1771116373
4. Update JIRA status to 'Ready for Review'
